message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is truly a game-changer in its category. It's designed to meet your needs and enhance your experience significantly. Given its high-quality features and benefits, I believe it's worth more than its face value. I am offering this exceptional product to you for $120. I understand that everyone has a different budget, so if $120 is beyond your current financial capacity, please let me know your maximum acceptable price, and we might be able to find a solution that works for both of us. Don't miss out on this opportunity to elevate your [specific need or activity], as there are limited units available. Looking forward to your response!
